content.question: Which of the following best describes how African Americans responded to insufficient transportation options during segregation?

choices.label: African Americans prioritized economic integration over their access to public services.
African Americans moved from rural areas to major cities for access to better transportation options.
African Americans elected congressional representatives who would enact changes in federal policies.
African Americans established taxi services and bus companies to serve their communities.

content.answer: African Americans established taxi services and bus companies to serve their communities.
